summary: In the wake of his daughter's disappearance, a father wallowing in grief feeds his desire to find her with unusual methods.
cast: Nuno Lopes|Beatriz Batarda|Miguel Guilherme|Ana Bustorff|Laura Soveral|Gonçalo Waddington|Carla Maciel|José Wallenstein|Clara Andermatt|Ivo Canelas|Teresa Faria|Carlos Santos|Fernando Luís|António Vaz Mendes|Rita Ferreira|Bárbara Barradas|Isabel Garcês|Patrícia Guerreiro|Joana Santos|Maria José Lopes|João Fonseca|Filipa Freire|Maria João Cruz|Tina Barbosa|João Barbosa|Filipe Burguete|Eva Tecedeiro
keywords: disappearance of a child|reference to alice in wonderland|inspired by true events|surveillance camera|depression
title: Alice
